messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Emergency Storage.

messages.author: Osmund Kimple (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">The Chem Dispenser has been stolen. Be on your guard!</font>
